Key Match Events: Washington Sundar took 3 wickets for 15 runs.
Avesh Khan took 2 wickets for 39 runs.
Dion Myers scored an unbeaten 65 off 49 balls for Zimbabwe.
Blessing Muzarabani took 2 wickets for 25 runs.
Miscellaneous Highlights: India outplayed Zimbabwe by 23 runs in the third T20.
The fourth T20 of the five-match series will be staged on July 13.
India restored normal service with back-to-back victories after losing the series opener.
Zimbabwe were poor in the field, conceding extra runs and grassing regulation catches.
